allow: Bash(powershell "Get-ChildItem -Path ''C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL'' -Recurse -Filter psql.exe -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty FullName")

Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\18\bin\psql.exe" -U postgres -d linkexpiry_dev -c "SELECT short_code, password_hash IS NOT NULL as has_password, is_active FROM links WHERE short_code = ''axK2LTN'';")

Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\18\bin\psql.exe" -U postgres -d linkexpiry_dev -t -c "SELECT short_code, CASE WHEN password_hash IS NOT NULL THEN ''YES'' ELSE ''NO'' END as has_password FROM links WHERE short_code = ''axK2LTN'';")
Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\18\bin\psql.exe" -U postgres -d linkexpiry_dev -c "SELECT short_code, password_hash, LENGTH(password_hash) as hash_len FROM links WHERE short_code = ''axK2LTN'';")

Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\18\bin\psql.exe" -U postgres -d linkexpiry_dev -t -A -c "SELECT short_code, ''|'' || password_hash || ''|'' as hash_with_markers FROM links WHERE short_code = ''axK2LTN'';")
Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\18\bin\psql.exe" -U postgres -d linkexpiry_dev -c "SELECT short_code, original_url FROM links WHERE short_code = ''Pzc5Glu'';")
Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\18\bin\psql.exe" -U postgres -d linkexpiry_dev -t -A -F"|" -c "SELECT short_code, original_url, is_active FROM links WHERE short_code = ''Pzc5Glu'';")
